Name: Seed Bombing
Description: A simple, cost-effective way to plant more trees per click.

Name: Improved Tree Nursery
Description: More efficient seedling production leads to slightly higher returns.

Name: Manual Watering System
Description: Basic irrigation allows for a small amount of passive tree growth.

Name: Mycorrhizal Network Expansion
Description: Utilizing fungal networks to connect trees and increase their growth.

Name: Precision Planting
Description: Optimized planting techniques maximize survival rates and wood quality.

Name: Drone Seeding
Description: Drones allow for rapid reforestation of large areas.

Name: Biofertilizers
Description: Natural fertilizers enhance tree growth and carbon sequestration.

Name: Automated Tree Harvester (for replanting)
Description: Robotics speed up the entire process, including replanting after harvesting.

Name: Genetic Tree Improvement
Description: Developing tree varieties that grow faster and are more resilient.

Name: Carbon Capture Technology (applied to processing)
Description: Capturing and selling carbon credits, making tree planting even more profitable.

Name: Atmospheric Moisture Harvesters
Description: Pulling water from the air to irrigate even arid regions.

Name: Ecosystem Restoration Projects
Description: Large-scale efforts to revitalize damaged ecosystems.

Name: Global Tree Mapping and Monitoring System
Description: Advanced technology for tracking forest health and carbon sequestration.

Name: Climate Engineering Research (Save the planet)
Description: Investing in the final research needed to reverse climate change.
